description: A selfish hubot plugin which autolinks JIRA tickets that have been mentioned
readme:
# Hubot Slack JIRA Linker

This plugin will try to automatically enrich things it thinks are JIRA tickets. It will _probably_ work for you, unless your tickets don't use things like `status`, `project` and `priority`.

Don't forget to set `HUBOT_JIRA_PATH` and `HUBOT_JIRA_AUTH`!
